meanings.definition: A dish made with sliced eggplant, breaded and fried, topped with tomato sauce and cheese.
meanings.sent1: My mom cooked a delicious parmigiana for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is eggplant parmigiana.
meanings.sent3: The parmigiana was so cheesy, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her parmigiana was a comforting hug in a dish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the parmigiana filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A dish made with sliced chicken or veal, breaded and fried, topped with tomato sauce and cheese.
meanings.sent1: I ordered the chicken parmigiana for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The veal parmigiana at that Italian restaurant is amazing.
meanings.sent3: The parmigiana made my taste buds dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: His cooking skills turned the chicken parmigiana into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the parmigiana was perfectly crispy.
